action.name: Set text
action.param: "WASD or Arrow keys to move, Z to select and X to cancel (though, you probably already knew this considering you need to know those to select help)"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "When in battle, pressing C returns you back to the menu"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Instant Death - Removes the soul shattering animation so you get to try again faster"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "No Death - You won't die when your HP is 0"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Heal in phase transition - When entering a new phase you get your items back and heal to full hp"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Auto Retry - You automatically retry after dying (Press C to get back to the main menu)"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Invisible HP - You cannot see your HP"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Golden Strike - When hitting in the middle you slow down time by 20% for the rest of the attack"
